Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ḥr Born of Rwrw with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
